messages.60: You FAILED! Time to hit the multiplication tables.
messages.70: You didn't quite fail... but you didn't quite pass. It's okay, math isn't for everyone.
messages.80: You passed! Nice work, but there's still room to improve!
messages.90: Look at you! Looks like someone has been practicing their multiplication tables...
messages.100: WOW! Is that at you, Einstein?
